Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your specific needs. Given its exceptional features and the time we've invested in its development, I believe it would significantly contribute to your business or personal endeavors. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $10000, which I believe is a fair reflection of its value and the opportunity it presents. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about how this product can benefit you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
